ITZY:
Let us take a look at ITZY's journey on the Spotify Top 200 Weekly South Africa chart. 
 They have had a total of 4 songs with approximately 105176004 million streams. 
As of 2023-04-20 , they are with Republic Records - ITZY
They first appeared on the chart on 2020-03-19. Their most recent appearance has been on 2021-10-28
Their highest position on the chart is 69 for the song In the morning which was at this position on 2021-05-06
Their lowest position on the chart is 195 for the song LOCO which was at this position on 2021-10-28
The songs of theirs that have appeared on the chart are In the morning ... LOCO ... Not Shy ... WANNABE
